services.title: Our Services
services.description: From executive vision to global rollout, DONOTA provides independent advisory support across the full lifecycle of CRM and clienteling programs.
services.closing: DONOTA's advisory support is always tailored to the maturity, ambition, and risk profile of each organization. We engage selectively, where our experience and independence can create the most value.

items.title: Executive CRM Vision & Strategy
items.description: We support executive teams in defining a clear CRM and clienteling vision aligned with business ambition, brand identity, and operational reality — particularly in environments where ambition outpaces structure.
features: Executive alignment on CRM purpose and success criteria
Clienteling model definition and target operating model
Multi-year roadmap prioritization, including relevant AI-enabled use cases, and sequencing

items.title: Transformation Oversight & Delivery Assurance
items.description: We provide independent oversight to ensure CRM programs remain structured, governed, and on track throughout delivery.
features: Program structuring and delivery model definition
items.note: Particularly relevant when multiple vendors, markets, or brands are involved.

items.title: Adoption & Clienteling Enablement
items.description: We focus on the conditions required for CRM and clienteling programs to be adopted and sustained by retail and head-office teams. Typically when technology is delivered but usage and business impact remain uncertain.
features: Retail, digital, and HQ stakeholder alignment

items.title: Global Program Governance
items.description: We design and reinforce governance structures that support clarity, accountability, and effective decision-making at scale; relevant when programs span regions, functions, or executive sponsors.
features: Governance model design across regions and brands
Roles, responsibilities, and decision rights definition

items.title: Run Stabilization & Optimization
items.description: We support organizations in stabilizing and optimizing CRM platforms after go-live to protect business continuity and long-term value. De-risking sustainability after the initial rollout is our priority.
features: Operational handover and support model clarification
Continuous improvement prioritization, including the progressive enablement of relevant AI-driven capabilities once platform stability is achieved

whyDonota.title: Why
whyDonota.subtitle: Experience, independence, and a disciplined approach to transformation

reasons.title: Our Unique Point of View
reasons.description: CRM transformation is more than technology; it's a strategic enabler of business growth. Success comes from aligning people, data, governance, and measurable outcomes. At DONOTA Advisory, our experience with global luxury brands has taught us how to design programs that deliver real business impact, not just system rollouts.

reasons.title: What We Stand For
reasons.description: We stand for disciplined execution, independent guidance, and measurable results. Our teams ensure data integrity, executive alignment, and adoption by the people who matter, so every program creates lasting value across markets.

reasons.title: How We Create Impact
reasons.description: We translate strategy into results: Ensuring trusted, high-quality data for confident decisions; Driving adoption and engagement across teams; Enforcing structured governance to sustain value; Aligning initiatives with local market realities; and delivering measurable business impact well beyond go-live.

reasons.title: Who We Work With
reasons.description: We partner with ambitious retail brands navigating complex CRM and clienteling transformations. Our clients value independent guidance, disciplined governance, and adoption-focused programs that deliver measurable, long-lasting results, whether they operate locally or across multiple markets.

about.name: Vida Tokodi, PMP®
about.role: Luxury Clienteling & CRM Transformation Director | Salesforce Programs | EMEA, Middle East & Asia
paragraphs: Program Director specializing in luxury clienteling and CRM transformation programs, with 9+ years of experience delivering high-impact Salesforce initiatives for leading maisons including Christian Dior Couture, Cartier, Louboutin, and Van Cleef & Arpels.

I lead complex, multi-country programs where data, sales associate adoption, governance, and business outcomes must align — managing multimillion-euro portfolios and large international teams to deliver measurable improvements in client engagement and retail performance.

My expertise sits at the intersection of Salesforce CRM, luxury retail operations, and program governance, with a strong focus on adoption, change management, and sustainable value creation beyond go-live.
about.location: Now based in Dubai, I advise and lead luxury and premium retail organizations across the Middle East on clienteling strategy, CRM transformation, and large-scale program delivery.
about.credentials: PMP®, Scrum Master & Salesforce Certified Administrator | French & English | Design Thinking & Digital Transformation
